'Adam Phillips' (born 19 September 1954 "Phillips,
Adam", Who's Who 2012, A & C Black, 2012; online edn, Oxford University Press,
Dec 2011 ; online edn, Nov 2011
[http://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/article/oupww/whoswho/U45253, accessed 9 July
2012] ) is a British psychotherapist and essayist.

Since 2003 he has been the general editor of the new Penguin Modern Classics
translations of Sigmund Freud. He is also a regular contributor to the [[London
Review of Books]].
